config.story_seed: generate a 20-hour neutral story about a smuggler caught between factions

planets.name: Tatooine

layouts.name: Caves Gamma
layouts.description: A caves area featuring sand dunes, canyons

layouts.name: Ancient Ruins
layouts.description: A ruins area featuring canyons, sand dunes

layouts.name: Lost Ruins
layouts.description: A ruins area featuring ancient ruins, oases

planets.main_quest: Investigate mysterious signals coming from Tatooine
side_quests: Help local merchants deal with smuggler problems
Uncover corruption in the local government
planets.lore_description:
Tatooine is a desert world with a hot climate, home to a sparse (thousands) population 
governed by a theocracy. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's desert environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

planets.lore_description:
Coruscant is a forest world with a mild climate, home to a sparse (thousands) population 
governed by a trade federation. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's forest environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

The world's forest environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

governed by a corporate oligarchy. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's volcanic environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

planets.lore_description:
Dagobah is a ice world with a frozen climate, home to a sparse (thousands) population 
governed by a republic democracy. The planet's unique characteristics have shaped both 
its inhabitants and their culture over millennia.

The world's ice environment has created distinct challenges and opportunities for those 
who call it home. Ancient ruins and mysterious phenomena suggest a rich history that 
predates current civilization, hinting at secrets waiting to be uncovered by those 
brave enough to explore its depths.

final_boss.name: Master Malel
final_boss.title: Broken Knight
final_boss.motivation: seeks to prevent a greater evil through lesser evils
final_boss.backstory:
Master Malel, known as Broken Knight, is a Miraluka who seeks to prevent a greater evil through lesser evils. 

Born during the old republic era, Master Malel was once a promising individual who 
showed great potential in the Force. However, their path took a dark turn when they 
discovered ancient secrets that changed their perspective on the galaxy.

Their current plan involves seeks to prevent a greater evil through lesser evils, which directly threatens the stability 
of the galaxy. The events described in "generate a 20-hour neutral story about a smuggler caught between factions" are merely the beginning 
of their grand design.

Master Malel has spent years gathering followers and resources, preparing for this moment when 
they can finally implement their vision for the galaxy's future. They see themselves 
not as a villain, but as a necessary force for change in a corrupt and stagnant galaxy.
mechanics: Boss uses psychological warfare and illusions
Boss demonstrates mastery of multiple weapon types during combat
Arena features dangerous environmental elements that activate periodically

phases.name: Opening Assault
phases.tactics: Aggressive attacks to test the player's strength

phases.name: Escalation
phases.tactics: Introduces environmental hazards and summons minions

phases.name: Desperation
phases.tactics: Uses most powerful abilities and becomes more unpredictable

phases.name: Final Stand
phases.tactics: Unleashes full power in a last desperate attempt

final_boss.arena_description: An elaborate throne room with multiple levels and hidden passages Located on Dagobah, this throne_room reflects the planet's ice environment. Elaborate architecture provides multiple levels and tactical advantages.

loot_drop.name: Master Malel's Legacy
loot_drop.flavor_text: The final remnant of Broken Knight Master Malel's power. This legendary armor pulses with the Force energy of its former owner, granting incredible abilities to those worthy enough to wield it.

weaknesses: Can be turned against the boss

main_quest_outline:
MAIN QUEST: Generate A 20-Hour Neutral Story About A Smuggler Caught Between Factions

ACT I - The Gray Path
- Start on Tatooine: Navigate complex moral choices
- Discover Master Malel's true motivations
- Choose your own path between light and dark

ACT II - Walking the Line
- Visit 3 worlds making difficult decisions
- Build relationships across all factions
- Prepare for the confrontation with Master Malel

ACT III - Your Destiny
- Face Master Malel on Dagobah
- Make the ultimate choice in An elaborate throne room with multiple levels and hidden passages Located on Dagobah, this throne_room reflects the planet's ice environment. Elaborate architecture provides multiple levels and tactical advantages.
- Shape the galaxy's future according to your vision
campaign_summary:
Campaign: Generate A 20-Hour Neutral Story About A Smuggler Caught Between Factions
Duration: 20 hours
Era: Old Republic
Alignment: Neutral Side focus

Your journey will take you across 6 worlds including Tatooine, Coruscant, Naboo, and 3 other worlds.
The ultimate confrontation awaits with Master Malel, seeks to prevent a greater evil through lesser evils.

This campaign emphasizes neutral side choices and is set during the old republic era.
